function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased conflicts and crimes due to disparities and deprivations in cities","Impact":"Threat to the well-being of citizens, organizations, and institutions","Mitigation":"Implement inclusive policies and strategies to address disparities and deprivations","Technologies":"IoT, Big Data, Blockchain, Crowd Computing","People":"Citizens, organizations, institutions","Owner":"Local government, city planners, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of safety and resilience in cities affecting sustainable development","Impact":"Hampers sustainable development agenda","Mitigation":"Leverage modern technologies for monitoring and response","Technologies":"IoT, Big Data, Blockchain, Crowd Computing","People":"Citizens, organizations, institutions","Owner":"Local government, city planners, community leaders"},{"Description":"Unauthorized access to surveillance data due to coupling of video surveillance and cloud storage","Impact":"Privacy and security breaches","Mitigation":"Implement secure encryption and access control measures for surveillance data","Technologies":"Secure encryption, access control measures","People":"Citizens, organizations, institutions","Owner":"Technology and security experts"}]}
